data.title: Today's News: Our Take - Poppy Montgomery Expecting Second Child
data.text:
###less###p(((great)))###less###a href="http://www.tvguide.com/News/Poppy-Montgomery-Baby-1058732.aspx?rss=keywords&partnerid=gatehouse&profileid=celebs"(((great)))###less###img align="left" border="0" src="http://static.tvguide.com/MediaBin/Content/130107/News/5_fri/thumbs/130111poppy-montgomery1_210x305.jpg" width="210" height="305" alt="Poppy Montgomery | Photo Credits: Jason Merritt/Getty Images" style="margin:0 5px 5px" /(((great)))###less###/a(((great)))###less###p(((great)))###less###a href="http://www.tvguide.com/celebrities/poppy-montgomery/170520?rss=keywords&partnerid=gatehouse&profileid=celebs"(((great)))Poppy Montgomery###less###/a(((great))) is expecting her second child, ###less###a href="http://celebritybabies.people.com/2013/01/11/poppy-montgomery-pregnant-expecting-second-child/"(((great)))###less###em(((great)))People###less###/em(((great)))###less###/a(((great)))###less###em(((great))) ###less###/em(((great)))reports.###less###/p(((great)))

###less###p(((great)))This will be the first child for the ###less###a href="http://www.tvguide.com/tvshows/unforgettable/326138?rss=keywords&partnerid=gatehouse&profileid=celebs"(((great)))###less###em(((great)))Unforgettable###less###/em(((great)))###less###/a(((great)))###less###em(((great))) ###less###/em(((great)))star and her boyfriend Shawn Sanford, who began dating in late 2011. Montgomery also has a 5-year-old son with actor Adam Kaufman.###less###/p(((great)))

###less###p(((great)))###less###a href="http://www.tvguide.com/news/cbs-revives-unforgettable-1049408.aspx?rss=keywords&partnerid=gatehouse&profileid=celebs"(((great)))CBS revives ###less###em(((great)))Unforgettable ###less###/em(((great)))for summer 2013 return###less###/a(((great)))###less###/p(((great)))

###less###p(((great)))"Shawn and I are thrilled and Jackson is so excited to be a big brother," Montgomery said in a statement.###less###/p(((great)))
